# Seaside Galleries

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/seaside-galleries-in-fortnite-creative
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-26T23:11:20.217074

---

**Seaside** galleries share similar [themes](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/fortnite-creative-glossary#island-theme) of structures and props you may find on coastal terrains.

In the **Galleries** [category](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/fortnite-creative-glossary#category), you can browse for building pieces to make unique structures. The Galleries tab also offers environmental and prop items as well. You can search by [category](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/fortnite-creative-glossary#category), or by gallery name (shown below).

This page is a visual guide to help you find galleries that fit this theme more quickly.

To learn more about how to place gallery pieces to create an island that’s uniquely your own, check out [Building Basics](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/building-basics-in-fortnite-creative).

## Coral Castle Category

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| [Coral Castle Gallery](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/962b68de-dd05-4f4e-96b8-cb7c47bebc56?resizing_type=fit) | [Coral Castle Prop Gallery](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/74ab841f-35e7-4b48-9b0c-bac93d0cee2c?resizing_type=fit) |
| **Coral Castle Gallery** | **Coral Castle Prop Gallery** |
